metadata.title: CVE-2014-3207 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in wserver.ml in SKS Keyserverbefore 1.1.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia the PATH_INFO to pks/lookup/undefined1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sks - 1.1.5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sks package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.5-1ubuntu1').
